item.description: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 You can also embed plots, for example: new example library(ggplot2) ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=carat, y=price, color=clarity)) + geom_point()
